sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Starring: James Millican, Mary Beth Hughes, Reed Hadley
Produced by: Ron Ormond
Directed by: B. Reeves Eason

Mystery rides the range in this spooky Western as an unknown killer marks his victims with playing cards! Watch for the who‚Äôs who supporting cast including Henry Hull, Jason Robards Sr., Glenn Strange, and Fuzzy Knight.

TRIVIA: Filmmaker Ron Ormond is best remembered for his 1953 Trash Can Cinema Classic MESA OF LOST WOMENüçï

sources.title: Rimfire (1949) Western movie directed by Nathan Juran | with James Millican | Colorized
sources.description:
Captain Tom Harvey, an undercover army agent, is investigating the theft of army gold shipments. During his undercover investigations, Harvey takes on the job of deputy sheriff and is drawn into discovering a ghost who is terrorizing the town. The ghost is apparently the manifestation of a gambler who was wrongly convicted and hanged for the gold thefts.

Original title: Rimfire (1949)


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/bnsh-ATeMrY

Director: B. Reeves Eason
Writers: Ron Ormond, Arthur St. Claire, Frank Wisbar
Stars: James Millican, Mary Beth Hughes, Reed Hadley
Genre: Colorized, Western, Noir, Mystery


00:00 Full colorized movie (with subtitles)
02:22 Wild West stagecoach robbery leads to unexpected alliances and a quest for riches in String Town.
08:26 Sheriff investigates gold theft after stagecoach robbery in a Western town.
13:25 Law enforcement deputy navigates town dynamics, encounters challenges, and gains respect in a Western setting.
25:44 Legal proceedings in a western town involving a defendant accused of using marked cards.
28:58 Injustice prevails as a man is wrongfully convicted and hanged for a crime he didn't commit in a town filled with greed.
36:25 Murder mystery unfolds in a Western town plagued by killings, gold slugs, and suspicions of a vengeful ghost.
48:31 Mystery surrounds a series of killings in String Town, possibly related to federal gold, with suspects being narrowed down by checking rimfire guns.
52:36 Unexpected visit leads to a gift of a gun, mistaken gold discovery, and a federal gold robbery plot in a western movie.
58:14 A Western movie plot unfolds as characters chase stolen gold, leading to a showdown and a heartfelt farewell.
